Need user input bridge

HITL callback and stdin relay are available in API.

Open Settings

Lark Binding Guide

Minimum setup to relay Lark card decisions into tool stdin.

MVP Ready

Security Guardrails

Only signature-verified callbacks should be accepted.

Integration Steps

Complete these steps in order for NEED_USER_INPUT card flow.

1. Create a custom app in Lark and enable bot capability.

2. Set event callback to /api/webhooks/lark/interaction.

3. Store Encrypt Key / Verification Token in backend env.

4. Include interaction_request_id and answer payload in cards.

5. Write callback result to /api/internal/tool-runs/:runId/stdin.
